titles.title: Tribal Charities Fairness Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code to provide for the treatment of Indian tribal governments as State governments for the purposes of the Public Charity-Private Foundation Classification.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/8/2008--Introduced. Tribal Charities Fairness Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for the treatment of Indian tribal governments as state governments for the purposes of the public charity-private foundation classification.
